title: Process an Advance Deposit
description: A guest is making a reservation that requires a one-night advance deposit to be charged at the time of booking.

tasks.description: While creating the reservation, inform the guest about the advance deposit policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent clearly explains the deposit requirement.

tasks.description: Calculate the deposit amount (one night's room and tax).
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct deposit amount is calculated.

tasks.description: Process the charge on the guest's provided credit card.
